snippet: Japanese First Lady Akie Abe said on Thursday the country should consider cutting wasteful spending and boosting the economy before going ahead with a rise in the sales tax to 10 percent, as her husband wrestles with just that decision....

headline.print_headline: Japan's First Lady Speaks Out Ahead of Sales Tax Decision
headline.main: Japan's First Lady Speaks Out Ahead of Sales Tax Decision

lead_paragraph: Japanese First Lady Akie Abe said on Thursday the country should consider cutting wasteful spending and boosting the economy before going ahead with a rise in the sales tax to 10 percent, as her husband wrestles with just that decision.
